column4: Identify Types of Suspension system Identify steering components and it's functions Identify Suspension components and it's functions Diagnose Steering and suspension malfunction Apply procedures of disassembly and assembly of steering and suspension system Apply procedures of replacing defective parts Apply of Basic/Special/Measuring tools and equipment Apply standard torques values, clearance and limits Perform Final Inspection of steering and suspension system Conduct road test Apply Procedures for Shop Maintenance Apply 5S Apply tools and equipment maintenance Observe environmental rules and regulations
